package.name: com.collab.echo
package.shortDescription: This section describes the Echo packages.
package.description: This section describes the Echo packages.

package.name: com.collab.echo.controls
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.controls package contains the Echo user-interface controls.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.controls package contains the Echo user-interface controls.

package.name: com.collab.echo.controls.buttons
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.controls.buttons package contains the classes used by the button-based controls.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.controls.buttons package contains the classes used by the button-based controls.

package.name: com.collab.echo.controls.menu
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.controls.menu package contains the classes used by the menu-based controls.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.controls.menu package contains the classes used by the menu-based controls.

package.name: com.collab.echo.controls.preloaders
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.controls.preloaders package contains the preloader classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.controls.preloaders package contains the preloader classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.controls.painter
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.controls.painter package contains whiteboard related classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.controls.painter package contains whiteboard related classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.controls.tools
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.controls.tools package contains the controls used by the whiteboard.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.controls.tools package contains the controls used by the whiteboard.

package.name: com.collab.echo.events
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.events package contains the classes that define Echo event objects.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.events package contains the classes that define Echo event objects.

package.name: com.collab.echo.containers
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.containers package contains the container classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.containers package contains the container classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.containers.form
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.containers.form package contains the form classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.containers.form package contains the form classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.containers.panels
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.containers.panels package contains the panel classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.containers.panels package contains the panel classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.containers.skins
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.containers.skins package contains the container skin classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.containers.skins package contains the container skin classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.containers.scrollpane
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.containers.scrollpane package contains the scrollpane classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.containers.scrollpane package contains the scrollpane classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.core
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.display package contains the core classes that the Echo framework uses to build visual displays.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.display package contains the core classes that the Echo framework uses to build visual displays.

package.name: com.collab.echo.core.rooms
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.core.rooms package contains room classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.core.rooms package contains room classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.core.messages
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.core.messages package contains message classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.core.messages package contains message classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.core.messages.chat
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.core.messages.chat package contains chat message classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.core.messages.chat package contains chat message classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.display
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.display package contains the core classes that the Echo framework uses to build visual displays.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.display package contains the core classes that the Echo framework uses to build visual displays.

package.name: com.collab.echo.display.util
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.display.util package contains the utility classes that the Echo framework uses to build visual displays.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.display.util package contains the utility classes that the Echo framework uses to build visual displays.

package.name: com.collab.echo.model
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.model package contains the value object classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.model package contains the value object classes.

package.name: com.collab.echo.net
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.net package contains classes for sending and receiving from the network, such as socket connections.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.net package contains classes for sending and receiving from the network, such as socket connections.

package.name: com.collab.echo.util
package.shortDescription: The com.collab.echo.util package contains various non-visual utility classes.
package.description: The com.collab.echo.util package contains various non-visual utility classes.
